text: Edward V. "Mickey" Stephens (April 4, 1944 â€“ August 14, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Georgia House of Representatives from 2009 until his death. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was also a member of the State House from 2002 to 2004. Stephens was born in Savannah, Georgia. Stephens died on August 14, 2021 in Savannah at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:People from Savannah, Georgia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:State legislators of the United States
title: Mickey Stephens
